duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, design, and implement automated applications using Microsoft Power Platform/Dynamics 365 CE in a lead role.
Provide guidance and share best practices regarding Power Platform development.
Translate requirements into plans and specifications by working with business customers and IT business analysts.
Communicate effectively in a team-based environment with all levels of staff and management.
Coach and mentor other developers on the team.
Produce design and other technical documentation.
Provide work estimates to the project team.
Troubleshoot applications and make recommendations for improvement.
Perform code reviews and approve pull requests for code produced by other team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or Computer Science (Master's preferred)
